languages.text: "Мне доставало причин и без этого откровения! Кей-морагх, я в полушаге от того, чтобы начать считать свое отлучение от кабала благом вместо наказания!"
"I had enough reasons even without this revelation! Kae-morag, I am half a step away from starting to see my expulsion from the Kabal as a blessing and not a punishment!"
languages.original_text: "Мне доставало причин и без этого откровения! Кей-морагх, я в полушаге от того, чтобы начать считать свое отлучение от кабала благом вместо наказания!"

traits.locale_text: "I had enough reasons even without this revelation! Kae-moragh, I am half a step away from starting to see my expulsion from the Kabal as a blessing and not a punishment!"
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: « Je ne manquais pas de raisons avant cette révélation ! Kae-morag, j'en viens presque à considérer mon expulsion de la Kabale comme une bénédiction et non plus comme une sanction ! »
languages.original_text: "I had enough reasons even without this revelation! Kae-morag, I am half a step away from starting to see my expulsion from the Kabal as a blessing and not a punishment!"

traits.locale_text: « Je ne manquais pas de raisons avant cette révélation ! Kae-moragh, j'en viens presque à considérer mon expulsion de la Kabale comme une bénédiction et non plus comme une sanction ! »
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: “就算没有这件事情，我也有足够多的理由干掉她！该死！恐怕用不了多久，被逐出阴谋团这件事情就不再是惩罚，而是给我的祝福了！”
languages.original_text: "I had enough reasons even without this revelation! Kae-morag, I am half a step away from starting to see my expulsion from the Kabal as a blessing and not a punishment!"

traits.locale_text: “就算没有这件事情，我也有足够多的理由干掉她！恐怕用不了多久，被逐出阴谋团这件事情就不再是惩罚，而是给我的祝福了！”
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: 「こんな事実がなくても、俺には十分な理由があった！カエ＝モラグ、陰謀団を追放されたことを罰ではなく祝福と思えるようになるまで、あと少しだ！」
languages.original_text: "I had enough reasons even without this revelation! Kae-morag, I am half a step away from starting to see my expulsion from the Kabal as a blessing and not a punishment!"

traits.locale_text: 「こんな事実がなくても、俺には十分な理由があった！カエ＝モラグ、陰謀団を追放されたことを罰ではなく祝福と思えるようになるまで、あと少しだ！」
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: "Auch ohne diese Offenbarung hatte ich schon genug Gründe! Kae-morag, ich stehe kurz davor, meinen Ausschluss aus der Kabale als Segen und nicht als Bestrafung anzusehen!"
languages.original_text: "I had enough reasons even without this revelation! Kae-morag, I am half a step away from starting to see my expulsion from the Kabal as a blessing and not a punishment!"

traits.locale_text: "Auch ohne diese Offenbarung hatte ich schon genug Gründe! Kae-moragh, ich stehe kurz davor, meinen Ausschluss aus der Kabale als Segen und nicht als Bestrafung anzusehen!"
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: «¡Tenía motivos de sobra incluso antes de este descubrimiento! ¡Kae-morag, estoy a un pelo de empezar a ver mi expulsión de la Kábala como una bendición en lugar de un castigo!».
languages.original_text: "I had enough reasons even without this revelation! Kae-morag, I am half a step away from starting to see my expulsion from the Kabal as a blessing and not a punishment!"

traits.locale_text: «¡Tenía motivos de sobra incluso antes de este descubrimiento! ¡Kae-moragh, estoy a un pelo de empezar a ver mi expulsión de la kábala como una bendición en lugar de un castigo!».
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: "Bu öğrenmeden önce de yeterince sebebim vardı! Kae-morag, iyi ki Kabal'dan kovulmuşum dememe şu kadarcık kaldı!"
languages.original_text: "I had enough reasons even without this revelation! Kae-morag, I am half a step away from starting to see my expulsion from the Kabal as a blessing and not a punishment!"

traits.locale_text: "Bunu öğrenmeseydik de yeterince sebebim var benim! Kae-morag, neredeyse iyi ki Kabal'dan kovulmuşum diyeceğim, az kaldı!"
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion
